email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
We hope you've had a smooth first week of term. IC Hack 22 is getting closer and with that, we have a couple of announcements to make.
Keep reading to find out more!
email.heading: IC Hack 22 Second Ticket Release
email.text: We are excited to announce that the second batch of tickets for IC Hack 22 will be going live on Friday the 21st of Jan at 1:30 pm, and based on the previous release, you'll have less than 10 seconds to claim one. You can find more info about IC Hack [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/453958873035077).
email.heading: IC Hack 22 Volunteers
email.text:
Didn't get a chance to snatch an IC Hack ticket, or you just don't feel like hacking but want to be involved in IC Hack 22?
Then fear not, because DoCSoc is looking for on-the-day volunteers.
More info can be found [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/962689311000324).
email.heading: ICC Hack 22
email.text:
Do you need to wear glasses and often find yourself in a disadvantageous position compared to your peers because you simply can't read the code?
Then worry not, because we're introducing ICC Hack 22 just for you.
More info will follow soon!
Yours truly,
I Can't C Hack 22 organizers
P.S. C# will be banned from this edition of IC Hack. We also expect that you can't program in C.
